short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sutherland SentinelAI Shield connect Chrome Extension monitors address bar URL and helps to protect corporate data

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sentinel Secure Chrome Extension monitors address bar URL and helps to protect corporate data by masking sensitive information in real time.
Sentinel Secure to secure business operations for Work at home employees The extension serves as an interface between Google Chrome and the Robility platform. Using the extension, the organization can monitor and restrict visibility of sensitive data in their web applications. Some of the data that is collected by the extension would include logged in user, URL accessed, title of the web page and event occurrence log. This information will be used by the organization to effectively control what information is made available to and employee working from home and thus protect exposure of business data.

The product activation flow will involve the following steps.
1.	Subscribe to Sentinel.AI Licenses – You can reach out to the Sutherland sales team at sales@sutherlandglobal.com for assistance.
2.	Sutherland will help create masking script for target web applications.
3.	Sutherland will deploy the masking script in the platform.
4.	Register the users in the platform.
5.	Enforce the Sentinel Secure extension installation for target users where web application data needs to be masked.
6.	Users on-login will be prompted to activate the product.
7.	Masking will be activated.

Outcomes of the extension
Users will not be able to access any webpage until the extension is activated. Users will be directed to Sentinel AI platform page for product activation.
On activation all the web applications that have been configured to enforce data protection will be activated.
Depending on un-masking configuration, an audit trail will be maintained in the platform.


About the platform
Organizations around the world are attempting to design how and where their teams work. Leaders are looking at implementing the future state of work that meets their team and business needs. The post pandemic hybrid/fully virtual work model is here to stay. Adopting and supporting a hybrid/fully virtual model enterprise-wide comes with an inherent range of security risks, especially for businesses that require their team members to access confidential and private data. This coupled with regional and local data privacy and security regulations, means that organizations are in a critical need of solutions that ensure private and sensitive information, remains secure regardless of where employees work from.

Brick-and-Mortar Level Security | Peace of Mind for Production Leaders | Confidence for Clients

Sutherland Sentinel is the most comprehensive remote worker security suite on the planet. Designed by CIOs for CIOs to be cost effective, bandwidth friendly, and easy for infosec professionals to deploy on a global basis.

Sutherland Sentinel allows remote employees to continue working productively while adhering to company and client security policies and without sacrificing privacy.

SUTHERLAND SENTINEL SUITE OF SOLUTIONS
Our Sentinel solutions are built on top of proven enterprise-grade platforms and may be deployed via our network or the client's. Implementation of Sutherland Sentinel solutions enables companies to adopt best practices, security hardening, and robust testing with no change to existing applications.

Sentinel Vision I Real-Time Monitoring
Dynamic webcam image analysis allows for real-time, ongoing authentication of remote staff based on Al-driven Cognitive Detection. It flags objects of interest (phone/notepad) or additional faces that fall within the webcam zone. The solution includes a searchable database of image capture history and triggers a pre-defined action when an anomaly is detected.

Sentinel Shield I Data Masking
Masks data on any browser screen based on a client’s security, privacy, and regulatory needs. Fields of information can be redacted, partially masked, completely masked and if required unmasked using multi factor authentication without any changes on the client’s applications.

Sentinel Audio | Noise Optimization
Proactively measures and provides recommendations to the user when excessive ambient noise is being detected. This ensures that the front-line staff carry out their business transactions from an environment which is conducive to providing the best quality of service with maximum engagement.

As organizations look to implement their future of work model, it’s imperative for organizations to balance data security, employee welfare & privacy, and productivity management. Sutherland Sentinel is a non-intrusive, non-invasive tool that ensures business continuity with proven security in place so clients can deliver a consistent customer experience while employing a geographically diverse workforce.

Secure Your People. Secure Your Data. Pass the Audit.

For more information on how we can help you transform your processes, visit us at www.sutherlandglobal.com, email us at sales@sutherlandglobal.com, or call 1.585.498.2042.
